titleInfo.title: Nashville Cats: James Burton Performance Signing

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and yellow on white) announcing James Burton, a Nashville Cats part of the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum's celebration of Music City Musicians, on July 23. Poster features a woodcut of a guitar.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
